page.title: 11Our School
page.content: The new school was opened in November 1982. Before this the school was huts. Now we have a proper building with three classrooms and a hall and library.The hall is used for dinners and assemblies as well as P.E.There are also rooms for the head teacher and staff and the secretary.We have 63 children in 3 classrooms.We have four teachers.Two of the classes open into an activity area where we do craft and such things.The small room where we watch T.V.listen to the radio or do group work.All the furniture in the scool is new.Most of the school is carpeted too.we also have a lot new apparatus and equipment including our computer. We think the new school is much better than the old one.
